DOC.brief_summary: This study assess functional performance musculoskeletal outcome transfemoral amputee improve receive Microprocessor Knee ( MPK ) compare Non-Microprocessor Knees ( NMPK ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Between Microprocessor Knees Non-Microprocessor Knees
DOC.detailed_description: The study design reversal design whereby prosthetic knee joint change . Each subject test use current NMPK , fit test MPK , test NMPK . MPK prostheses manufacturer consider appropriate testing . Each MPK use study FDA approve . The foot L5981 class , e.g . flex foot equivalent . The socket , suspension , foot use throughout study order eliminate confounding variable . All prosthesis fitting perform subject 's certified prosthetist accord manufacturer ' fitting guideline .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral transfemoral amputee Medicare Functional Classification Level K2 K3 Currently use NMPK prosthesis No current residual limb problem , skin breakdown Able ambulate without gait aid Previous stroke neuromuscular complication currently affect gait Currently undergo dialysis treatment Amputation contralateral limb Poor fit current NMPK prosthesis
